resources.string: Day 1 \nCitizen Kane : An exploration about power, wealth and the American Dream. This movie was created in 1941.
Day 2 \nThe Godfather: This Movie is about the rise to power of the Corleone Family, A crime organization in New York. This movie was created in 1972
Day 3 \n Casablanca: A timeless Lovestory set against the Backdrop of World War II. This movie was created in 1942
Day 4 \nThe Shawshank Redemption: A heartwarming and inspiring story about hope and redemption set in prision. This Movie was created in 1994.
Day 5: \nPulp Fiction: A nonlinear film that explores themes of heroism, villainy and the nature of chaos. This film was released on 1994
Day 6: \nInception: A mind-bending science fiction thriller that explores the nature of dreams and reality. This film was released on 2010
Day 7: \nInterstellar: A mind-bending science fiction epic that explores the nature of time and Space. This film was released on 2014.
Day 8: \nThe Silence of the Lambs: A chilling thriller about an Investigator seeking help from a genius serial killer. This film was released on 1991
Day 9: \nFight Club: A provocative and constroversial film that explores consumerism, masculinity, and mental illness. This film was released on 1999.
Day 10: \nSeven: A dark and gritty crime thriller that follows two detectives as they hunt a serial killer that follows the Seven Deadly sins. This film was released on 1995.
Day 11: \nParasite: A Korean Film that is a dark comedy-thriller that satarizes class inequality and social hiearchy. This film was relead on 2019.
Day 12: \nApocalypse Now: A disturbing film about the Vietnam War. This film was relead on 1979.
Day 13: \n2001: A Space Odyssey: A mind-bending film about exploration of the past, present and future of humanity. This film was released on 1968.
Day 14: \nThe Pianist: A historical drama about a Polish-Jewish pianist who survived the Holocaust. This film was released o 2002.
Day 15: \nSeven Samurai: A classic Japanese film about a group of Samurai who defend a village from a group of bandits. This film was released on 1954.
Day 16: \nThe Matrix: A science fiction about a computer hacker who discovers the truth about reality. This film was released on 1999.
Day 17: \nSpirited Away: A Japanese animated film about a young girl who gets lost in a spirit world. This film was released on 2001.
Day 18 \nOldboy: A south Korean revenge thriller that is very disturbing and violent. This film was relead in 2003.
Day 19 \nNo Country for Old Men: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and becomes a target of a ruthless killer. This film was released on 2007.
Day 20 \nSchindlers List: A German businessman saves the lives of hundreds of Jews during the Holocaust. This film was released on 1993.
Day 21 \nOn The Job: A gritty crime thriller that exposes the dark underbelly of the Philippine politics and the criminal justice system. This film was released on 2013.
Day 22 \nBatch 81: A coming of age film about a group of college students and their experiences while joining a fraternity. This film was released on 1982.
Day 23 \nMaynila: Sa Kuko ng mga Liwanag: A drama about a young man who moves to Manila to search for his long lost lover. This film was released in 1975.
Day 24 \nInsiang: A drama about a young woman who is forced to become a prostiture. This film was released in 1976.
Day 25 \nMetro Manila: A gripping drama about a man who moves to the city to escape powerty and ends up in the criminal underworld. This film was released in 2013.
Day 26 \nFeng Shui: A horror film about a mysterious Chinese artifact that brings wealth and misfortune to its owner. This film was released in 2004.
Day 27 \nHeneral Luna: A historical biopic about General Antonio Luna, a military strategist during the Philippine-American War. This film was reeased in 2015.
Day 28 \nManila Kingpin: The Asiong Salonga Story: A biographical film about the notorious gangster Asion Salonga.
Day 29 \nHimala: A drama about a young girl who claims to have seen the Vigin Mary. This film was released in 1982.
Day 30 \nMagnifico: A drama about a poor young boy who strives to make a difference in the lives of those around him. This film was released in 2003.
